record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2070
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2070 -- (Senate - September 19, 2007)

[Page: S11774]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there is a bill at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the first time.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2070) to prevent Government shutdowns.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for a second reading, and in order to place the bill on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV, I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read for its second time on the next legislative day.
